title: Update branding to ProSellers across the entire landing page

requirements.text: Replace all instances of the consultant brand name with 'ProSellers' across the entire landing page. Update the Navigation bar logo/brand text to 'ProSellers', update the Footer to read 'ProSellers — Amazon Growth Consultant', update the HTML page title in index.html to 'ProSellers | Amazon Growth Consultant', and update any other location where the brand/company name appears as a standalone label (e.g., section headings, meta tags, or branded taglines). The consultant's personal name 'Mayur Sahu' should remain unchanged wherever it appears as a person's name (About section, credentials, testimonial references).
acceptanceCriteria: The Navigation bar logo/brand text displays 'ProSellers'
The Footer reads 'ProSellers — Amazon Growth Consultant'
The HTML <title> tag in index.html reads 'ProSellers | Amazon Growth Consultant' or similar
No stray references to the old brand name remain in any visible UI text
The personal name 'Mayur Sahu' is preserved unchanged in the About/Founder section and credential lines

constraints: Do not change 'Mayur Sahu' personal name references — only company/brand name references should be updated to 'ProSellers'
Do not alter any section layout, animations, or styling while making this text change
nonGoals: Changing any section content beyond brand name references
